Tom Emerson wrote:

>
> It's possible that things timed out --- connections to the PRC (where
> all of the sites in this crawl are located) are pretty slow of late.

Timeouts should show in logs.  And besides the RIS should be getting 
cleaned up anyways even if a timeout. Mind sending me the 
heritrix_out.log time Tom so I can take a look?
Thanks,
St.Ack
